ygData.subject: Re: research item on lvl 16+
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, this changes throughout the levels... At Lvl 1, your statement would not be true, without question 2 levels higher would be Red... As you move up the
ygData.messageBody:
Well, this changes throughout the levels...
At Lvl 1, your statement would not be true, without question 2 levels higher
would be Red...
As you move up the levels, the range increases. I'm sure someday we'll see
a nice chart on how the spread increases but for now just know that it does.
You can usually get a 'feel' for it as you continue to con the same old
beasts as you are leveling. I can't remember for sure, but I do remember
feeling that at Lvl 13, anything 3 levels above was Red.

-----Original Message-----
From: yur@... [mailto:yur@...]
Sent: Tuesday, June 29, 1999 10:40 AM
To: eq_spell_research@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_spell_research] research item on lvl 16+

From: yur@...

The Yellow con does not mean 1 lvl higher. it can be a max of 4 lvl higher.
above 5 lvl higher is a red
